channel_db Struct Reference

#include <scream.h>


Data Fields

size_t db_len

Detailed Description

A collection of the available public IPv4 interfaces (i.e., ignoring loopback).

Field Documentation

size_t channel_db::db_len

The number of the available channels.

The available channels.
